Scratch-Off.js

Transform your site into a scratch-off lottery ticket with one line of JavaScript.

Try it now

This entire page is covered in scratch-off material. Use your mouse (or finger on mobile) to scratch it away. Hit ~60% and it auto-reveals.

One Line Install

<script src="https://scratchy-lotto.com/scratch-off.iife.js"></script>

Bookmarklet

Drag this button to your bookmarks bar, then click it on any website to turn that page into a scratch-off ticket:

Scratch-Off!

Or copy this code and create a new bookmark manually:

javascript:(function(){if(window.ScratchOff){alert('ScratchOff is already active on this page!');return;}var s=document.createElement('script');s.src='https://scratchy-lotto.com/scratch-off.iife.js';s.onerror=function(){alert('Failed to load ScratchOff. Check your internet connection.');};document.body.appendChild(s);})();
